heroSubheadline: Online strength coaching for women who want to look and feel incredible.
aboutMe: I'm Ava, a strength and conditioning coach specializing in helping women build confidence in and out of the gym. My coaching blends structured progressive overload, habit development, and mindset training so you can unlock your strongest self. Whether you're a beginner or ready to advance, we'll build a clear, sustainable plan together.

programs.name: 12-Week Strength Transformation
programs.shortTagline: Build lean muscle & develop unstoppable confidence.

programs.name: Busy Professional Program
programs.shortTagline: Strength coaching designed for tight schedules.

testimonialQuote: Ava helped me get in the best shape of my life. I finally feel strong, capable, and consistent.
